text: "Burning Bright" is the fourth single from the rock band Shinedown's debut album Leave a Whisper. A new mix of the song was featured on the re-release of Leave a Whisper, titled the "Sanford" mix. It reached number two on the Billboard Mainstream Rock Tracks chart.
